description: From a spot in a Tube station for a pop-up shop to industrial space, our portfolio of properties available to rent is varied enough to meet your needs

texts: We take pride in being able to offer everything from a business space where you can test a new idea as a pop up, through to modern industrial spaces or central London offices. The size of our estate and our ability to offer properties across London with flexible leases means that we can work with you to fulfil your changing business needs.

primarys.title: Available properties
texts: Search our database of current business and retail spaces
